title: Pokemon Unite Tier List
description: This tier list ranks all of the playable Pokemon in Pokemon Unite based on their current strength and viability in the game. The list is divided into five tiers: S Tier, A Tier, B Tier and C Tier. S Tier is the highest tier, and C Tier is the lowest tier. The tier list is based on a variety of factors, including each Pokemon's stats, abilities, and Unite Move. It is important to note that this tier list is subjective and may change as the game evolves.
heading: Pokemon Unite Tier List
introText: This tier list ranks all of the playable Pokemon in Pokemon Unite based on their current strength and viability in the game. The list is divided into five tiers: S Tier, A Tier, B Tier and C Tier. S Tier is the highest tier, and C Tier is the lowest tier. The tier list is based on a variety of factors, including each Pokemon's stats, abilities, and Unite Move. It is important to note that this tier list is subjective and may change as the game evolves.

data.itemDescription: Absol is a burst damage attacker with great mobility. It can quickly eliminate squishy targets with its Cross Cut, Psycho Cut, and Night Slash combo

Aegislash is a versatile Pokemon that can switch between its Stance Form and Blade Form. In Stance Form, it is a tank that can take a lot of damage, while in Blade Form, it is a powerful attacker that can deal massive damage
Azumarill is a strong all-around attacker with good damage, mobility, and crowd control. It can be a menace in both the early and late game
Charizard is a powerful ranged attacker that can deal a lot of damage from a safe distance. It also has a strong Unite Move that can wipe out entire teams
Dragapult is a unique attacker that can move around the map quickly and deal damage from unexpected angles. It is also very good at taking out multiple enemies at once
Garchomp is a strong melee attacker with good damage and mobility. It can also dive into the enemy team and disrupt their formation with its Unite Move
Lapras is a tanky support Pokemon that can provide its team with shields and healing. It also has a strong Unite Move that can stun and damage multiple enemies
Machamp is a melee attacker with great burst damage and crowd control. It can also knock enemies around with its Unite Move
Mamoswine is a tanky attacker with good damage and crowd control. It can also freeze enemies with its Unite Move
Sableye is a support Pokemon that can disrupt the enemy team with its stuns and disables. It is also very good at stealing objectives
